alert.note: Alert for Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sussex County through 200 PM EDT... At 129 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Homeville, or 8 miles south of Disputanta, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Homeville around 200 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Newville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
